forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 83. East wind around 6 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 67. South wind 2 to 6 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds, Boston reveals a canvas of partly sunny skies, the warmth of approaching summer settling around an agreeable 83 degrees. An easterly breeze whispers gently, creating a pleasant dance of air that balances the heat. Yet, as twilight beckons, the atmosphere promises a transformation. Expect the emergence of patchy fog, softly rolling in after midnight, while the cloud cover begins to blanket the city. A nighttime low of 67 will encourage a cozy embrace, as a light south wind nudges the air, whispering promises of a warm, serene night.

In this embrace of mild weather, light layers will offer comfort, inviting a stroll through the heart of the city or perhaps a leisurely sit at a favorite café. One might delve into the pages of a good book while sipping a chilled beverage or explore nearby parks as the sun continues its descent. The day’s transition into night, adorned with clouds that lend a hint of mystery, calls for thoughtful engagement with the surroundings—perfect for a moment of quiet reflection or catching up with a friend. The setting feels pleasant, cloaked in a gentle warmth that encourages both connection and introspection.
